blocks.subject: Environmental Strategy Issues: An interview with CERA Director Susan Ruth - CERA Multimedia Highlights
text: Title: Interview with Director Susan Ruth on Environmental Strategy Issues
CERA Director Susan Ruth sat down recently with CERA's
New Media team to discuss the short-term research focus
CERAWeek2002 - February 11-15, 2002 - 21st Annual Executive Conference and
Related Events REGISTER ONLINE TODAY AT:  http://www.cera.com/ceraweek
